name: Chicken Boom for Android
description:
For use on Android devices

Chicken Boom is a bang - at least for the chickens. It's raining hens and it is up to you to take up an arsenal of various weapons like rifles and shotguns to lower the poultry population down a few notches. You never did trust chickens, did you?

New in patch 1.5:
> Rotating daily bonuses - each day plays differently
> Fight the wind as it blows the chickens to and fro
> Numerous balance tweaks

Features:
> Non-stop, chicken-blasting shooting action
> A range of weapons at your disposal
> Entertaining music
> Entirely in-game coin shop for power-ups
> Google Play Games support including leader boards and achievements
